title: Project - To Do APP
name: To Do Application
about: A modern to do application where you can do all the basic operations. It comes with dark as well as light theme and you can change your preference accordingly.
about2: The functionality of this application are:
keyPoints: Change theme according to your preference

title: Project - Rock Paper Scissors Game
name: Rock Paper Scissors Game
about: This is a rock, paper, scissors, lizard, and spock game. You can play against computer. It has a modern neuromorphism UI and you can change your theme preference accordingly.
about2: The functionality of this application are:
keyPoints: Change theme according to your preference
LocalStorage feature for storing your score
